price: Así que no invoquen a nada ni nadie junto a Dios, porque se autocondenarían al castigo.
arabic: فَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: falā tadʿu maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fatakūna mina al-muʿadhabīna
